main event: An observer reported seeing a solid, elongated metallic object, described as black and silver, in Granville, Ohio in 1967.
interesting points: The object was reported as solid and metallic in appearance., The color of the object was described as black and silver., The report was part of the Project Blue Book documentation., The object was observed by a witness who filled out a detailed questionnaire., The conclusion of the report suggested the possibility of the sighting being an aircraft.
witness description: Observer's name and details were redacted.
